Name: Colorful Alteration
Effect: Change the elemental damage type dealt by the altered spell to one of the three associated with your school of magic, shown in the table in the sidebar.

Name: Bold Alteration
Effect: Change all stacks of ailments applied by the altered spell to one of the three associated with your school of magic, shown in the table in the sidebar.

Name: Fundamental Alteration
Effect: Change the special attack type used by the altered spell to correspond to an attribute of your choice.
